snippet.title: Celebrity Real Estate: Rihanna, Pink, Sarah Michelle Gellar And Zac Efron
snippet.description: It’s Buh-Bye L.A. For Rihanna Rihanna has left the building -- and L.A.. -- so it makes sense that the sultry songstress has put her luxurious Pacific Palisades mansion up for sale. The listing comes just months after she tried to rent the 10,000-square-foot manse for $65,000 a month. It appears that [...] read »

snippet.title: Coldplay, Rihanna And Jay-Z To Play London Paralympics Closing Ceremonies
snippet.description: Jay Z Coldplay, Rihanna and Jay-Z are on deck to perform at the London Paralympics Closing Ceremony tonight. According to reports, Coldplay will play "Us Against The World," "Yellow," "Up In Flames," "42," "God Put A Smile On Your Face," "Clocks," and "Charlie Brown." Rihanna will join Coldplay's Chris Martin for a duet [...] read »

snippet.title: Chris Brown Defends Good Morning America Outburst Via Twitter
snippet.description: Chris Brown, who has been desperately trying to rehabilitate his image in order to sell his new album F.A.M.E, reportedly exploded behind the scenes at Good Morning America this morning, according to reports. Apparently, he wasn't thrilled with GMA anchor Robin Roberts, who asked him on-air about the 2009 Rihanna [...] read »
